ygData.messageBody:
i read on eqcasters.com (well, somewhere) that it is not limitless, but it
is about 3 times normal. if the NPC is not engaged in combat, it is
limitless. the reason being someone could cancel magic repeatedly on an NPC
(does not aggro it) so that it constantly is rebuffing itself, thus running
out of mana. but in combat, it is only 3 times normal and thus seems
limitless.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> First, it's not seemingly - it *is* limitless mana. A guide
> friend of mine
> confirmed that one...
> And a few additions to your list:
> Can cast while moving, Can open locked doors, can see through
> walls, can
> attack from the bottom of the ocean, don't drown - ever, can
> chase you even
> when blinded....
>
> And the list goes on....
>
> Talies
